name: tab-move-key

0.1.0.name: tab-move-key
0.1.0.author: Jonathan Gotti <jgotti at jgotti dot org>
0.1.0.description: move editor panes using your keyboard

readme:
# tab-move-key package

Simply move your editor panes around using your keyboard only.

default key mapping:
- alt-pageup move pane to left
- alt-pagedown move pane to right

![A screenshot of your spankin' package](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/69169/2290250/c35d867a-a017-11e3-86be-cd7c5bf3ff9b.gif)
